name: basquiatjs
description: A JavaScript implementation of basquiat, built on top of js-ipfs and pica.
author: Elliott Benisty <elliott.benisty@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ellttBen)

scripts.start: npm run bundle && npm run release
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run bundle && ipfs add -Qr dist | xargs printf 'http://localhost:8080/ipfs/%s
scripts.debug-release:
npm run clean && npm run debug-bundle && ipfs add -Qr dist | xargs printf 'http://localhost:8080/ipfs/%s
'
